Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Match
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
    Class containing every information needed for the execution of a single match
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getView

        public MatchView getView​(Player viewer)
        Gives a representation of the match which is suitable to be sent to a client
        Parameters:
        viewer - Player whose perspective will be reflected in the MatchView
        Returns:
        View of the match, ready to be serialized and sent

        players - List of players to receive the message
